data.name: BOK-BOK: Hen Tie Club
data.detailed_description:
*WARNING, THIS GAME IS INCREDIBLY DIFFICULT*


Take the role of Henry Cock once more as you climb the towers to retrieve the sacred tie that grants entry into the exclusive Hen-Tie club!

Using a simple 2 button control system, this unique 3-flap platformer will have you on the edge of your seat!

Features:
- One large level consisting of 6 stages
- Checkpoints (Because we're not that evil)
- Built-in speedrun timer
- A whole heap of pain and suffering

data.short_description: Take the role of Henry Cock once more in this tough as nails platformer featuring a unique 3-flap movement mechanic.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: QuadCore 2.6 Ghz
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
